name: blocksmd
description: Markdown to amazing forms and web pages

scripts.build: rtlcss dist/css/blocksmd.css dist/css/blocksmd.rtl.css && tsc && npm run format && csso dist/css/blocksmd.css -o dist/css/blocksmd.min.css -s file && csso dist/css/blocksmd.rtl.css -o dist/css/blocksmd.rtl.min.css -s file && webpack --config webpack.config.js && npx babel dist/js/blocksmd.bundle.min.js -o dist/js/blocksmd.bundle.min.js && terser dist/js/blocksmd.bundle.min.js -o dist/js/blocksmd.bundle.min.js

author: Tahmid Khan Nafee
